code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/api/notes";var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var noteService={getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};export default noteService;
